item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. PCBs, copper pours, ground planes, and you (29 points | 7 comments)
2. An analysis of DeepSeek's R1-Zero and R1 (463 points | 184 comments)
3. OpenAI says it has evidence DeepSeek used its model to train competitor (509 points | 1298 comments)
4. Blueskyfeedbot: Post RSS Feeds to Bluesky via GitHub Actions (88 points | 33 comments)
5. Building a T1D smartwatch for my son from scratch (267 points | 38 comments)
6. SmolGPT: A minimal PyTorch implementation for training a small LLM from scratch (246 points | 33 comments)
7. Advice for a friend who wants to start a blog (123 points | 60 comments)
8. Proper decoupling capacitor practices, and why you should leave 100nF behind (70 points | 29 comments)
9. Mathesar – an intutive spreadsheet-like interface to Postgres data (72 points | 19 comments)
10. From C++ to Clojure: Jank language promises best of both (118 points | 30 comments)
11. Commercial jet collides with Black Hawk helicopter near Reagan airport (254 points | 202 comments)
12. Parsing PDFs (and more) in Elixir using Rust (103 points | 11 comments)
13. Asteroid Impact on Earth 2032 with Probability 1% and 8Mt Energy (274 points | 221 comments)
14. Exposed DeepSeek database leaking sensitive information, including chat history (502 points | 326 comments)
15. Classic Duck Hunt game made in JavaScript and Kaplay (41 points | 14 comments)
16. A major Postgres upgrade with zero downtime (144 points | 47 comments)
17. Etleap (YC W13) Is Hiring a Senior Software Engineer (SF) ( | hide)
18. When the Sackler brothers studied LSD (15 points | discuss)
19. Airflow – Stream media files directly from macOS to AirPlay devices (107 points | 38 comments)
20. Show HN: TinyJs React like framework in 35 lines of code (11 points | 6 comments)
21. We got hit by an alarmingly well-prepared phish spammer (170 points | 103 comments)
22. Case Study: ByteDance Uses eBPF to Enhance Networking Performance (131 points | 17 comments)
23. Keymapper: A cross-platform context-aware key remapper (55 points | 15 comments)
24. An update on Dart macros and data serialization (129 points | 103 comments)
25. Soviet Shoe Factory Principle (108 points | 88 comments)
26. I still like Sublime Text (1013 points | 529 comments)
27. Hard Mode Rust (3 points | 1 comment)
28. Ötzi the Lyme Mummy (2019) (69 points | 22 comments)
29. Decompiling 2024: A Year of Resurgance in Decompilation Research (5 points | discuss)
30. Cardan grille (40 points | 4 comments)
